name: In The Dead Of Night - Urszula's Revenge
description: In The Dead of Night is a story driven top down game that merges the best elements of RTS with Tower Defence. Take control of the town to gather resources and build your defences before Urszulaâ€™s zombies charge upon you at nightfall.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.5Ghz Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT 440 Storage: 3 GB available space
